thread.title: Win Summer Essentials with the Telegraph - Terms and Conditions
thread.title_full: Win Summer Essentials with the Telegraph - Terms and Conditions - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win Summer Essentials with the Telegraph - Terms and Conditions
text: Alive! Terms and Conditions Win a 3 month supply of NEW Alive! Multi-Vitamins and Minerals Employees of Schwabe Pharma UK, their agents and families are excluded from entering the draw. Those professionally associated with the promotion and their families are excluded from entering the draw. Entry into this competition confirms your acceptance of these Terms and Conditions and your agreement to be bound by the decisions of Schwabe Pharma UK. The winner(s) may also be contacted by the promoter’s agents or third parties to arrange provision of the prize. There is no cash alternative to the stated prize. Schwabe Pharma UK reserves the right to offer a similar prize, or a prize of equal or greater value, if the stated prize is unavailable. Prizes must be dispatched to a UK postal address. The Alive! range of products is managed and distributed by Schwabe Pharma UK. The promoter of this offer is Schwabe Pharma UK. Company address: Alexander House, Mere Park, Dedmere Road, Marlow, Bucks SL7 1FX. No purchase necessary. The prize will be sent to the winner’s postal address within 28 days of the closing date. Avenue 32 – Terms and Conditions Win £200 to spend on luxury fashion at Avenue32.com Competitions are open to anyone except for the staff of Avenue 32 and any related 3rd party retailers involved in a specific competition, and their families. No alternative cash or otherwise to the stated prizes are available. Prize is non-refundable and cannot be combined with other promotions. By ticking the opt in box in the competition each entrant agrees that Avenue 32 may use their name and email address for future promotional, marketing and publicity purposes. On receipt of an entry the competition entrant is deemed to have accepted Avenue 32 terms and conditions and to have agreed to be bound by them. Voucher can be spent on any item from Avenue 32 website 1 X £200 voucher The voucher expiry date is 31.03.2016 Voucher can be used as part payment No change will be given Voucher will be sent by email to the winner within 28 days of the closing date of the promotion No exclusions. The voucher can be used to purchase any item on Avenue 32. Voucher can be used in conjunction with other offers Justebikes – Terms & Conditions Win a Bertie Bike Bag from Hill&Ellis, part of our British bike accessory collection RRP £195 Prize: Prize is one Bertie Bike Bag from Hill and Ellis RRP £195 This is non-transferable and cannot be exchanged for in store credit. The prize will be delivered to the winner’s postal address within 28 days of the competition closing date. Offer: The online offer includes a discount code Stella100 redeemable in store at any of our 3 shops but not online. This code offers £100 discount on any Sparta e-bike we stock ordered before 30th September 2015. This offer only applies to Sparta e-bikes. Any e-bike ordered in conjunction with this offer must be collected from one of our stores. Depending on model and frame size an expected collection date will be given at point of order, but it must be noted that this will be a provisional date that may change if there are shipping delays from Holland. We will endeavour to keep the customer informed of all delays. Sparta e-bikes meet all EU and UK regulations concerning the manufacture and performance of pedelecs (electrically assisted bikes). E-bikes can only be used by those aged 14+. LighterLife Terms and Conditions Win a three month supply of LighterLife Fast® products Prize package will be sent to the winner’s postal address within 28 days of the competition closing date. No cash alternatives and prize is non-transferable. Products are for use with LighterLife Fast plan only and as directed. Not to be used by pregnant or breastfeeding women, people under 16 years of age, or people with a BMI of less than 20. Talk to your GP before starting any weight loss programme. Pyrex Terms and Conditions Win a selection of Pyrex cookware products worth over £120 Prize includes delivery. Prize will be delivered to the winner’s postal address within 28 days of the competition closing date. No cash alternative will be offered. SuperBreak – Terms and Conditions Win a relaxing two night stay for two people at the stunning 4* Hogarths Stone Manor hotel in Stone, Worcestershire worth £250 Prize venue - Hogarths Stone Manor Hotel, Stone, Kidderminster, Worcestershire, DY10 4PJ Breakfast on both nights is included in the prize, as well as an allowance of £25.00 per person towards food for an evening meal on the first night of the stay. Insurance and travel to the hotel is not included. The customer must book / redeem their prize before 30th November 2015. The prize cannot be taken between 6-9th September and 13-15th September 2015. Complimentary upgrade – subject to availability The prize is for two adults (aged above 18) only. The Prize is as stated, non-negotiable, non-transferable, subject to availability and there is no cash alternative or different holiday option. The promoter reserves the right (a) to substitute alternative prizes of equivalent or greater value and (b) in exceptional circumstances to amend or foreclose the promotion without notice. Your statutory rights remain unaffected. Winners accept prize at own risk. Winners should obtain their own travel insurance and ensure they’re fit to travel. Also, if selected winner is unable to take the prize, the winner will have to forfeit the prize. In the event of unforeseen circumstances, SuperBreak reserves the right to offer an alternative prize of equal or greater value (such prizes to be of equal or greater value) and/or alter the competition in any way, including cancelling or withdrawing the competition altogether. SuperBreak reserves the right to withhold prizes in the event of non-compliance with these terms and conditions or if SuperBreak deems, in its absolute discretion, there to have been any malpractice throughout the competition period. SuperBreak Mini-Holidays Ltd accepts no liability for the prize or for any loss or damage arising from its issue. Employees connected with this promotion from superbreak.com, any employees of third party prize suppliers and promotional agencies and their families are excluded from taking part in this prize draw. Anyone found to be a third party supplier will automatically forfeit the prize and a redraw will take place. @telegraph
